result.markdown:
--- title: "What we learned so far" author: - name: Felix Schönbrodt orcid: 0000-0002-8282-3910 email: felix.schoenbrodt@psy.lmu.de affiliations: Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München date: "XXX" footer: "Formal modeling in psychology - Empirisches Praktikum, Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München" format: FOMO-revealjs: output-ext: slide.html transition: slide html: default revealjs-plugins: - attribution --- ## We learned [technical skills]{.alert} - How to use `git` - commit, push, pull, merge - use branches (`dev` and `main`) - make **releases of our theory** - How to make our theory **citeable** with `cff` files - How to apply **semantic versioning** to our theory - How to program ABMs in Netlogo ## We learned [conceptual skills]{.alert} - How to draw a causal diagram in Bischof style - How to formalize a theory with the Visual Argumentation Structure Tool (VAST) - How to properly define a construct ## We learned [basics of theory building]{.alert} - What is (not) a theory? - The relation between data, phenomena, models, and theory - Theory construction methodology # End ## Contact
  • @nicebread@scicomm.xyz
  • ed.uml.ysp@tdorbneohcs.xilef
  • https://www.nicebread.de
  • https://github.com/nicebread
[![CC-BY-SA 4.0][cc-by-sa-image]][cc-by-sa] [cc-by-sa]: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ [cc-by-sa-image]: https://licensebuttons.net/l/by-sa/4.0/88x31.png [cc-by-sa-shield]: https://img.shields.io/badge/License-CC%20BY%20SA4.0-lightgrey.svg

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
